speaker:
FIRST
               
              WATCH
text:
Come
               
              on
              ,
               
              my
               
              masters
              ,
               
              each
               
              man
               
              take
               
              his
               
              stand
              .

speaker:
FIRST
               
              WATCH
text:
The
               
              King
               
              by
               
              this
               
              is
               
              set
               
              him
               
              down
               
              to
               
              sleep
              .

speaker:
SECOND
               
              WATCH
text:
What
              ,
               
              will
               
              he
               
              not
               
              to
               
              bed
              ?

speaker:
FIRST
               
              WATCH
text:
Why
              ,
               
              no
              ,
               
              for
               
              he
               
              hath
               
              made
               
              a
               
              solemn
               
              vow

speaker:
FIRST
               
              WATCH
text:
Never
               
              to
               
              lie
               
              and
               
              take
               
              his
               
              natural
               
              rest

speaker:
FIRST
               
              WATCH
text:
Till
               
              Warwick
               
              or
               
              himself
               
              be
               
              quite
               
              suppressed
              .

speaker:
SECOND
               
              WATCH
text:
Tomorrow
              ,
               
              then
              ,
               
              belike
               
              shall
               
              be
               
              the
               
              day
              ,

speaker:
SECOND
               
              WATCH
text:
If
               
              Warwick
               
              be
               
              so
               
              near
               
              as
               
              men
               
              report
              .

speaker:
THIRD
               
              WATCH
text:
But
               
              say
              ,
               
              I
               
              pray
              ,
               
              what
               
              nobleman
               
              is
               
              that

speaker:
THIRD
               
              WATCH
text:
That
               
              with
               
              the
               
              King
               
              here
               
              resteth
               
              in
               
              his
               
              tent
              ?

speaker:
FIRST
               
              WATCH
text:
’Tis
               
              the
               
              Lord
               
              Hastings
              ,
               
              the
               
              King’s
               
              chiefest
               
              friend
              .

speaker:
THIRD
               
              WATCH
text:
O
              ,
               
              is
               
              it
               
              so
              ?
               
              But
               
              why
               
              commands
               
              the
               
              King

speaker:
THIRD
               
              WATCH
text:
That
               
              his
               
              chief
               
              followers
               
              lodge
               
              in
               
              towns
               
              about
               
              him
              ,

speaker:
THIRD
               
              WATCH
text:
While
               
              he
               
              himself
               
              keeps
               
              in
               
              the
               
              cold
               
              field
              ?

speaker:
SECOND
               
              WATCH
text:
’Tis
               
              the
               
              more
               
              honor
              ,
               
              because
               
              more
               
              dangerous
              .

speaker:
THIRD
               
              WATCH
text:
Ay
              ,
               
              but
               
              give
               
              me
               
              worship
               
              and
               
              quietness
              ;

speaker:
THIRD
               
              WATCH
text:
I
               
              like
               
              it
               
              better
               
              than
               
              a
               
              dangerous
               
              honor
              .

speaker:
THIRD
               
              WATCH
text:
If
               
              Warwick
               
              knew
               
              in
               
              what
               
              estate
               
              he
               
              stands
              ,

speaker:
THIRD
               
              WATCH
text:
’Tis
               
              to
               
              be
               
              doubted
               
              he
               
              would
               
              waken
               
              him
              .

speaker:
FIRST
               
              WATCH
text:
Unless
               
              our
               
              halberds
               
              did
               
              shut
               
              up
               
              his
               
              passage
              .

speaker:
SECOND
               
              WATCH
text:
Ay
              ,
               
              wherefore
               
              else
               
              guard
               
              we
               
              his
               
              royal
               
              tent

speaker:
SECOND
               
              WATCH
text:
But
               
              to
               
              defend
               
              his
               
              person
               
              from
               
              night
               
              foes
              ?

speaker: WARWICK
text:
This
               
              is
               
              his
               
              tent
              ,
               
              and
               
              see
               
              where
               
              stand
               
              his
               
              guard
              .

speaker: WARWICK
text:
Courage
              ,
               
              my
               
              masters
              .
               
              Honor
              ,
               
              now
               
              or
               
              never
              !

speaker: WARWICK
text:
But
               
              follow
               
              me
              ,
               
              and
               
              Edward
               
              shall
               
              be
               
              ours
              .

speaker:
FIRST
               
              WATCH
text:
Who
               
              goes
               
              there
              ?

speaker:
SECOND
               
              WATCH
text:
Stay
              ,
               
              or
               
              thou
               
              diest
              !

speaker: SOMERSET
text:
What
               
              are
               
              they
               
              that
               
              fly
               
              there
              ?

speaker: WARWICK
text:
Richard
               
              and
               
              Hastings
              .

speaker: WARWICK
text:
Let
               
              them
               
              go
              .
               
              Here
               
              is
               
              the
               
              Duke
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
The
               
              Duke
              ?

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
Why
              ,
               
              Warwick
              ,
               
              when
               
              we
               
              parted
              ,
               
              thou
               
              call’dst
               
              me
               
              king
              .

speaker: WARWICK
text:
Ay
              ,
               
              but
               
              the
               
              case
               
              is
               
              altered
              .

speaker: WARWICK
text:
When
               
              you
               
              disgraced
               
              me
               
              in
               
              my
               
              embassade
              ,

speaker: WARWICK
text:
Then
               
              I
               
              degraded
               
              you
               
              from
               
              being
               
              king

speaker: WARWICK
text:
And
               
              come
               
              now
               
              to
               
              create
               
              you
               
              Duke
               
              of
               
              York
              .

speaker: WARWICK
text:
Alas
              ,
               
              how
               
              should
               
              you
               
              govern
               
              any
               
              kingdom

speaker: WARWICK
text:
That
               
              know
               
              not
               
              how
               
              to
               
              use
               
              ambassadors
              ,

speaker: WARWICK
text:
Nor
               
              how
               
              to
               
              be
               
              contented
               
              with
               
              one
               
              wife
              ,

speaker: WARWICK
text:
Nor
               
              how
               
              to
               
              use
               
              your
               
              brothers
               
              brotherly
              ,

speaker: WARWICK
text:
Nor
               
              how
               
              to
               
              study
               
              for
               
              the
               
              people’s
               
              welfare
              ,

speaker: WARWICK
text:
Nor
               
              how
               
              to
               
              shroud
               
              yourself
               
              from
               
              enemies
              ?

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
Yea
              ,
               
              brother
               
              of
               
              Clarence
              ,
               
              art
               
              thou
               
              here
               
              too
              ?

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
Nay
              ,
               
              then
              ,
               
              I
               
              see
               
              that
               
              Edward
               
              needs
               
              must
               
              down
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
Yet
              ,
               
              Warwick
              ,
               
              in
               
              despite
               
              of
               
              all
               
              mischance
              ,

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
Of
               
              thee
               
              thyself
               
              and
               
              all
               
              thy
               
              complices
              ,

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
Edward
               
              will
               
              always
               
              bear
               
              himself
               
              as
               
              king
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
Though
               
              Fortune’s
               
              malice
               
              overthrow
               
              my
               
              state
              ,

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
My
               
              mind
               
              exceeds
               
              the
               
              compass
               
              of
               
              her
               
              wheel
              .

speaker: WARWICK
text:
Then
               
              for
               
              his
               
              mind
               
              be
               
              Edward
               
              England’s
               
              king
              ,

speaker: WARWICK
text:
But
               
              Henry
               
              now
               
              shall
               
              wear
               
              the
               
              English
               
              crown

speaker: WARWICK
text:
And
               
              be
               
              true
               
              king
               
              indeed
              ,
               
              thou
               
              but
               
              the
               
              shadow
              .
              —

speaker: WARWICK
text:
My
               
              lord
               
              of
               
              Somerset
              ,
               
              at
               
              my
               
              request
              ,

speaker: WARWICK
text:
See
               
              that
               
              forthwith
               
              Duke
               
              Edward
               
              be
               
              conveyed

speaker: WARWICK
text:
Unto
               
              my
               
              brother
              ,
               
              Archbishop
               
              of
               
              York
              .

speaker: WARWICK
text:
When
               
              I
               
              have
               
              fought
               
              with
               
              Pembroke
               
              and
               
              his
               
              fellows
              ,

speaker: WARWICK
text:
I’ll
               
              follow
               
              you
               
              and
               
              tell
               
              what
               
              answer

speaker: WARWICK
text:
Lewis
               
              and
               
              the
               
              Lady
               
              Bona
               
              send
               
              to
               
              him
              .
              —

speaker: WARWICK
text:
Now
               
              for
               
              awhile
               
              farewell
              ,
               
              good
               
              Duke
               
              of
               
              York
              .

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
What
               
              Fates
               
              impose
              ,
               
              that
               
              men
               
              must
               
              needs
               
              abide
              ;

speaker:
KING
               
              EDWARD
text:
It
               
              boots
               
              not
               
              to
               
              resist
               
              both
               
              wind
               
              and
               
              tide
              .

speaker: OXFORD
text:
What
               
              now
               
              remains
              ,
               
              my
               
              lords
              ,
               
              for
               
              us
               
              to
               
              do

speaker: OXFORD
text:
But
               
              march
               
              to
               
              London
               
              with
               
              our
               
              soldiers
              ?

speaker: WARWICK
text:
Ay
              ,
               
              that’s
               
              the
               
              first
               
              thing
               
              that
               
              we
               
              have
               
              to
               
              do
              ,

speaker: WARWICK
text:
To
               
              free
               
              King
               
              Henry
               
              from
               
              imprisonment

speaker: WARWICK
text:
And
               
              see
               
              him
               
              seated
               
              in
               
              the
               
              regal
               
              throne
              .
